sentence.Network_en: Afternoon groups relate to the specific addictions and problems therein.
sentence.Network_cn: 下午的小组谈到具体的上瘾病例以及其中的问题。

sentence.Network_en: The insurance policy covers the building and any fixtures contained therein.
sentence.Network_cn: 保险单为这座大楼及其中所有的设施保了险。

sentence.Network_en: Therein our letters do not well agree.
sentence.Network_cn: 在那一点上我们的几封信是不一致的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 考博英语词汇 ... thereafter prep． 此后 therein ad. 在那里，在那时 thereof ad. 它的，其；由此.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... therefore 所以 therein 在其中 thereof 关于.
考博英语词汇 ... thereafter prep． 此后 therein ad. 在那里，在那时 thereof ad. 它的，其；由此.
个字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 个展〖 exhibitionofoneperson'sworks〗 个中〖 therein〗 个中人〖 personintheknow〗.

list.abs: it is not heavy exercise that I guide you towards but rather a gentle walk or a swim , allowing yourself reconnect to nature and the elements therein .我指导你的不是繁重的训练，而是接近于温和的步行或者游泳，允许你自己重新连结大自然和在那里的元素。
Alan Tam  -... ... 11.Life Expectation 一生何求 14.Persist therein 执迷不悔 15.A bit sad sort of crazy 几分伤心几分痴.
therefore 因此therein after 在下文中Three Strike Law 三次犯罪终生监禁法
at his word the wind is his thought he appeaseth the deep , and the Lord hath planted islands therein .他一计议，深渊遂即沉没，其中的岛屿于是突出。

entry.def: Therein means contained in the place that has been mentioned.

example.ex: By burning tree branches, pine needles, and pine cones, many not only warm their houses but improve the smell therein.
example.tran: 许多人在家里烧树枝、松针和松果，不但给房子取暖，还改善了屋里的气味。

entry.tran: 其中(指和刚提及的事情有关)
entry.def: Therein means relating to something that has just been mentioned.

example.ex: Afternoon groups relate to the specific addictions and problems therein.
example.tran: 下午的小组谈到具体的上瘾病例以及其中的问题。

entry.tran: 此即，缘此(用以说明某事是由某种情况导致)
entry.def: When you say therein lies a situation or problem, you mean that an existing situation has caused that situation or problem.

example.ex: Santa Maria di Castellabate is barely mentioned in guidebooks; therein lies its charm.
example.tran: 卡斯特拉巴泰的圣玛丽亚在旅行指南里鲜有被提及，而它的魅力正在于此。

means.word_mean: 1. (formal) in or into that thing or place;

sentences.sentence: "they can read therein what our plans are"

auth_sentence.content: I was astonished at the appalling ignorance displayed therein.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was astonished at the appalling ignorance displayed therein.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was astonished at the appalling ignorance displayed therein.

auth_sentence.content: Drilling into these sands releases the resources trapped therein.
auth_sentence.res_content: Drilling into these sands releases the resources trapped therein.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Drilling into these sands releases the resources trapped therein.

auth_sentence.content: Therein lies the fatal vulnerability of the non-physicalist hypothesis.
auth_sentence.res_content: Therein lies the fatal vulnerability of the non-physicalist hypothesis.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Therein lies the fatal vulnerability of the non-physicalist hypothesis.

means.word_mean: (用于强调某事是由某种情况引起的)那就是，此即，缘此

sentences.en: He works extremely hard and therein lies the key to his success.
sentences.cn: 他工作极为勤奋，那就是他成功的关键。
